name: mpgbi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wal(s0, w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, w1), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wal(s0, w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, w1), w0)

comment: Modus ponens on biconditional combined with generalization. (Contributed by NM, 24-May-1994.) (Proof shortened by Stefan Allan, 28-Oct-2008.)
